post:
Welcome to UptimeVPS Sales.


UptimeVPS believes in maximum uptime for its customers so we use state of the art hardware and networks to stick to our guns! Check out a few of our guarantees and goals!


All support is brought to you by numerous members of staff with years of experience.
Soon to be launching premium UK & US KVM Servers!
Our nodes support both x86 templates and x86_64 offering you a great choice of variety depending on your requirements.
None of our support / sales staff are outsourced - 100% in-house support team!
Want to try us out? We offer a 7 day money back guarantee - what do you have to lose?


**Kicking things up a gear here at UptimeVPS. Now with 4 Dedicated UK Support Staff & Live Support / Sales **
Fantastic savings without compromising on levels of support.
